INSERT INTO user_layer_data (
user_layer_id, uuid, feature_id, property_json, geometry)
VALUES ( #user_layer_id#, #uuid#, #feature_id#, CAST (#property_json# as json), ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(#geometry#) ) RETURNING id

property_json = #property_json#, geometry = ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(#geometry#)
